v1.helmValues:
replicaSet: rs0
replicas: 3
port: 27017
# Specs for the Docker image for the init container that establishes the replica set
installImage:
  name: gcr.io/google_containers/mongodb-install
  tag: 0.3
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
# Specs for the MongoDB image
image:
  name: mongo
  tag: 3.4
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent
# Annotations to be added to MongoDB pods
podAnnotations: {}

resources: {}
  # limits:
  #   cpu: 100m
  #   memory: 512Mi
  # requests:
  #   cpu: 100m
  #   memory: 512Mi

persistentVolume:
  enabled: true
  ## If defined, volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: <storageClass>
  ## Default: volume.alpha.kubernetes.io/storage-class: default
  ##
  # storageClass: fast
  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  size: 10Gi
  annotations: {}

# Annotations to be added to the service
serviceAnnotations: {}

# Entries for the MongoDB config file
configmap:
  storage:
    dbPath: /data/db
  net:
    port: 27017
  replication:
    replSetName: rs0
v1.helmValuesDefaults:
replicaSet: rs0
replicas: 3
port: 27017

# Specs for the Docker image for the init container that establishes the replica set
installImage:
  name: gcr.io/google_containers/mongodb-install
  tag: 0.3
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

# Specs for the MongoDB image
image:
  name: mongo
  tag: 3.4
  pullPolicy: IfNotPresent

# Annotations to be added to MongoDB pods
podAnnotations: {}

resources: {}
  # limits:
  #   cpu: 100m
  #   memory: 512Mi
  # requests:
  #   cpu: 100m
  #   memory: 512Mi

persistentVolume:
  enabled: true
  ## If defined, volume.beta.kubernetes.io/storage-class: <storageClass>
  ## Default: volume.alpha.kubernetes.io/storage-class: default
  ##
  # storageClass: fast
  accessModes:
    - ReadWriteOnce
  size: 10Gi
  annotations: {}

# Annotations to be added to the service
serviceAnnotations: {}

# Entries for the MongoDB config file
configmap:
  storage:
    dbPath: /data/db
  net:
    port: 27017
  replication:
    replSetName: rs0

metadata.name: mongodb-replicaset
metadata.releaseNotes: Move mongodb-replicaset to stable and update mongo version to 3.4 (#428)
